name: ClunkSimulator
description:
What is it about?

This game is like a physics simulator. The only difference is that this game's purpose is not to show you how great I am at coding life-like physics. No, this is about Unity physics. By playing this game you will see how great is the Unity physics engine. For a better experience, I suggest you turn the sound on.

Why should you play it?

Personally, I think that this game is worth the time you will spend on it. You need to click one button, and you are playing. No money spent, downloads or other waitings.

IMPORTANT

I published the code from this game on GitHub. It is about collision detection. If you are a developer, follow this link.
